faqs.title:
Frequently
Asked
Questions
faqs.subtitle: Your guide to business automation with Databayt.

openSource.title: Is the codebase really open source?
openSource.description: Yes! Every component and building block is open source. We charge for crafting fully functional solutions and ensuring their ongoing reliability.

points.1: All atomic components and templates are freely available
points.2: Contributors earn a share of the value they help create
points.3: Full transparency in development and business processes

whatAutomate.title: What exactly does Databayt automate?
whatAutomate.description: We automate repetitive business processes, streamline workflows, and build custom solutions that save you time and reduce manual work.

planSelection.title: How do I know which plan is right for my business?
planSelection.description: Choose One Project for specific challenges, Strategic Partner for ongoing development needs, or Product Access for ready-made automation tools. We can help you decide during a consultation.

dataScientist.title: How can I contribute as a Data Scientist?
dataScientist.description: Build data analysis automation, predictive models, AI agents for business insights

support.title: Do you provide ongoing support?
support.description: Yes, we offer continuous support and maintenance to ensure your automation solutions keep running smoothly as your business grows and evolves.

remote.title: Is this work remote?
remote.description: Yes, completely remote! Contributors work from anywhere in the world. We use GitHub for collaboration, async communication, and project management.

partTime.title: What if I can only contribute part-time?

points.3: Start with small tasks and grow your involvement
points.4: Earn proportional to your contribution level

payment.title: How much do you pay contributors?

points.1: Contributors earn a percentage of revenue generated from components they build
points.2: Higher contribution value = higher revenue share
points.3: Transparent tracking of all contributions and earnings

getStartedContributing.title: How do I get started contributing?

points.1: Explore the codebase at our GitHub repository
points.2: Join our community discussions to introduce yourself
points.3: Pick a first issue - we have "good first issue" labels for newcomers
points.4: Submit a pull request - start small and build up
points.5: Earn your first revenue share as your contributions are used

getStarted.title: How do I get started?
getStarted.description: Contact us for a consultation where we'll discuss your specific needs, challenges, and goals. We'll recommend the best approach and provide a detailed proposal.

useComponents.title: Can I use Databayt components in my own projects?
useComponents.description: Yes! All components are open source and can be used in your projects according to their respective licenses. We encourage reuse and building upon our work.

portfolio.title: Can I include Databayt projects in my portfolio?
portfolio.description: Absolutely! Working with us provides multiple portfolio benefits:

points.1: Add real-world enterprise projects to your portfolio
points.3: Demonstrate experience with modern tech stack
points.4: Build a public contribution history on GitHub

earningModel.title: How does the earning model work for real-world projects?
earningModel.description: Our earning model has multiple streams:

points.1: Revenue share from components used in client projects
points.2: Direct earnings from client project implementations
points.5: Ownership stake in projects you help build
